data.cassandra_yaml_d_001_operator_overrides_:
cluster_name: test-cluster
listen_address: null
rpc_address: 0.0.0.0
seed_provider:
- class_name: com.instaclustr.cassandra.k8s.SeedProvider
  parameters:
  - service: cassandra-test-cluster-dc1-seeds
endpoint_snitch: org.apache.cassandra.locator.GossipingPropertyFileSnitch
disk_access_mode: mmap
authenticator: PasswordAuthenticator
authorizer: CassandraAuthorizer
role_manager: CassandraRoleManager

data.cassandra_rackdc_properties:
# generated by cassandra-operator
prefer_local=true
dc=dc1
rack=rack1
